mapper.insert: insert into rc_visit(user_id, page_id, doc_date) values (#{visit.userId}, #{visit.pageId}, #{visit.docDate})
mapper.select: select count(distinct user_id) from rc_visit a where a.doc_date between date_trunc('day', now()) and date_trunc('day', now()) + interval '1 day'
